about_the_game:
Welcome to Dungeon Raiders! A Roguelike dungeon crawler game with cards to acquire and loot to find!

Make your way through perilous dungeons, battle monsters with cards and outfit your raiders with the best gear you find along the way. Any extra loot you find can be sold in your customizable shop for profit! Use your coins to buy better cards, shop improvements and extra raiders to bring along for the journey.

Demo Offers

The below is descriptive of the full game. This demo will let you play with the initial starting card deck and play up to dungeon level 3, giving about an hours play time. You will be free to re-play the completed levels as much as you like and collect common tier raider gear, as well as customize a limited sized shop.



  • Collect, unlock and build a card deck from 40+ unique cards.
  • Fight a variety of monsters each with their own unique cards to play against you.
  • 60 dungeon quest levels to complete (30 in cave biome and 30 in desert biome).



  • 200+ weapons, gear and objects to find with increasing rarity.
  • Customize and outfit your raiders with collected loot to increase your stats and abilities.
  • Navigate procedurally generated dungeons, fight and get back out with your loot.



  • Start with a small shop, expand and build.
  • Sell loot found in the dungeons for extra coin.
  • Buy and add decorations to increase your shops rating and attract more customers.

The Journey

You'll start with a single raider and a small empty shop. Navigate around the world map and complete each of the 3 dungeon quests to unlock the next set of levels. With each dungeon level set completed, you'll unlock new items, cards and shop decor to spend with your hard earned coins.


You'll start with a single raider and gather up to 6 along the journey. Each of which can be outfitted with whatever combination of gear and weapons you like. The stats of the gear equipped have a real affect on the cards you play, along with your overall party HP, attack power, defense and mana.

Eventually you'll be taking on the toughest monsters, building out your strongest card deck and running a massive shop!

name: Dungeon Raiders Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dungeon Raiders is a roguelike dungeon crawler game with cards to acquire and loot to find! In this demo, you'll make your way through perilous dungeons, battle monsters with cards, outfit your raiders with the best gear and sell any extra loot you find in your customizable shop for profit!
